1.subtitle: CUSTOMER EXCLUSIVE TEAMS
1.text: We build an extension of your company at a remote location, this means, you manage and keep your core competence in your company and outsource only non-essential tasks, such as team building, payroll, infrastructure, etc.

2.subtitle: WEB APPLICATIONS
2.text: We focus on delivering products with the highest levels of usability, scalability, security and integration with mobile devices, browsers and platforms by working on the most modern front-end and back-end platforms, focusing on highly interactive and responsive UI experiences

3.subtitle: MOBILE APPLICATIONS
3.text: For our mobile app development and mobile-ready web solutions, we have engineers with experience developing native iOS, Android apps, as well as hybrid solutions.

4.subtitle: Geographic Information Systems
4.text: We provide environmental and geographic engineers capable of analyzing GIS data.

5.subtitle: User experience (UX) design
5.text: we also design a UI/UX that is easy to use and understand, aiming on achieving the best possible user engagement.

view_about.title: UBICUO TECH
view_about.1: Is a Mexican company focused on delivering the best tech-oriented talent to the international market.
view_about.2: We are based in Guadalajara, the Tech-booming city of LATAM and second largest in México. Host city for Ciudad Creativa Digital.
view_about.3: We were chosen by the U.S. Government of state in 2016 to represent México through the Young Leaders of the Americas Initiative (YLAI) program.
view_about.4: We work together with 303 Software, a 10+ years of experience Denver, Colorado based company.

1.subtitle: REAL TIME COLLABORATION
1.text: Similar time zone allows real time collaboration.

2.subtitle: 30%-40% LESS COST THAN INTERNAL U.S. BASED TEAM
2.text: Lower cost of salaries (without lowering quality), payroll taxes and the corresponding cost on offices.

3.subtitle: HIGH CULTURAL AFFINITY
3.text: high degree of shared understanding and alignment.

4.subtitle: EASY TRAVEL
4.text: Low cost and short time travel allows face to face meetings.

5.subtitle: ITELLECTUAL PROPERTY (IP) PROTECTION
5.text: NAFTA incorporates a unified IP protection for US, Canada and México.

6.subtitle: AGILITY
6.text: Same business hours allows real time problem solving between teams.

1.title: CEO at 303 Software and President for Entrepreneurs Organization´s Colorado chapter, EOCO.
1.text: Ubicuo Tech is 303 Software's go to development partner because they are reliable, communicative, and highly skilled
